title: Turf Wars, Tree Men & Murder: Inside the world of Christmas tree selling in NYC
description: Christmas trees are big business in NYC. Running a tree lot takes grit and experience, and even then, it's a tough network to break into. All of the lots in the city are divided into separate territories, owned by only a handful of entrepreneurs. We spent the day working for NYC's busiest Christmas tree seller on Greg Walsh's busiest day of the year to better understand the wild logistics behind NYCâ€™s Christmas tree economy and the tumultuous history of running a lot in this city. author: HubSpot
